content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the šiauliai district court the defendant has been ordered to pay various fees including stamp duty and legal fees in the final resolution the court awarded the applicant with several properties and ordered the defendant to fulfill their obligations under a credit agreement the applicant is seeking to abolish the tytuvėnai church holy trinity and annul the registration of their marriage as well as division of matrimonial property and child maintenance payments the court will decide on the division of property and compensation the defendant is also ordered to pay the applicants legal fees

metadata.cost: 150.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 1179.75 EUR (legal fees) + 1382.60 EUR (stamp duty) + 33.20 (court fees)
